data.title: South Ayrshire Schools, UK
data.meta_description: South Ayrshire Schools PPP project, which has been part of the HICL portfolio since 2011, is a 33-year concession to finance, construct and maintain three new primary schools, two new secondary schools and a new performing arts annex at an existing secondary school for South Ayrshire Council.
